Key Match Events: United States won the match by 7 wickets
Aaron Jones had a six-spangled innings that steered USA home in Cup opener
Pre-Game Insights: United States won the toss and elected to bowl
Post-Match Reflections: US rocket home for big World Cup win against Canada
Miscellaneous Highlights: Aaron Jones was the Player of the Match
Others: The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024
The match was played on 2 June 2024 at the Grand Prairie Stadium
